function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of space for self-isolation in shared apartments","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases such as COVID-19","Mitigation":"Design and implement flexible housing solutions to support self-isolation within shared units","Technologies":"Use of modular and adaptable furniture, partition walls, and flexible spatial configurations","People":"Roommates, partners, families living in shared apartments","Owner":"Architects, property developers, and housing authorities"},{"Description":"Challenges in implementing health and safety protocols in shared apartment housing","Impact":"Difficulty in maintaining physical distancing and separate living spaces as per health guidelines","Mitigation":"Adapt apartment layouts to include larger bathrooms, wider hallways, and flexible living spaces to support distancing","Technologies":"Incorporation of smart home technology, adaptable architectural design, and multi-functional furniture","People":"Residents of shared apartment buildings","Owner":"Apartment building owners, property managers, and housing authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate affordable housing for self-isolation","Impact":"Limited accessibility to safe and affordable housing for individuals needing to self-isolate","Mitigation":"Develop affordable housing designs with adequate space for self-isolation and distancing measures","Technologies":"Innovative modular construction, affordable building materials, and sustainable housing solutions","People":"Individuals in need of affordable housing, especially during pandemics","Owner":"Government agencies, housing organizations, and affordable housing developers"}]}
